Bessel functions Jv(x) 
#####################

setup:

x in [0,1]
nsamples = 101 
rule = Riemann

nu = [0, 10]
ntrain = 101

seed = 0
tolerance = 1e-14


training.mean() = 0.06928933426151282
training.std() = 0.18574983807399412
